website_summaries.verdict: Apple’s updated base model may even turn the heads of dedicated Air owners thanks to its fast, reliable performance at a very attractive price.
pros: Has a clear, crisp retina display and nice extras like split screen
Springy and responsive with improved WiFi signal detection
Battery life is a big plus, lasting 2 to 3 days
cons: Unlike the latest Pro models, this iPad still has the home button

customer_reviews.title: Not Cheap but Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my wife. She had been using my old ipad 2 (2012) but was unable to use some current apps, so this was a much needed upgrade. At first she wasn't sure it was worth it when she found out how much it cost, but after using it for a few weeks now she says she loves it! Compared to the old ipad 2 it's like night and day. I have an ipad 2017 and it would be difficult to justify getting the 2019 version since it seems only marginally quicker, but if you have an older ipad (or any other older tablet) I would definitely recommend this. Happy wife = happy me! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Steve Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great ipad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad. And I would say it's better than an android device. Needed it to be idiot proof and not to lag. Perfect for him. Android devices seem to lag after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Apple IPad 2019 , 10.2 inch 32gb WiFi
customer_reviews.text: What a nice update from our old old iPad, smoother glide touchscreen, great fingerprint recognition, much quicker response. Just plus plus plus
customer_reviews.author: D. Pass

customer_reviews.title: Smart ipad
customer_reviews.text: Updated my iPad which is 5 years old very fast and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Reliable device
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, reliable device like any other Apple devices. It’s just been released on the market.. no disadvantages. I would have bought it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elannah

customer_reviews.title: Robust light and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This iPad is the best I have had. It is fast and the screen is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kneale

customer_reviews.title: Awful, second hand
customer_reviews.text: Shocked to discover it is used iPad from 2015. Only learned this because battery charge didnt work. I thought I was getting brand new iPad Lesson learn. I went to argos
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this item
customer_reviews.text: I'll start off by stating that I am an Apple-phobe and hate everything Apple. It killed my to buy this for my daughter. However, the report from my daughter is that this is a very useful tool that is helping her in school and is great to watch movies on with a very clear screen. The memory isn't a problem as it is not used as a main camera and so doesn't need lots of storage. The price made this a bargain as I got it at far less than high-street prices on Amazon. So it pains me to say it but 5 stars for this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mac

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present.
customer_reviews.text: I have given this a 5 Star rating mainly because it is Apple & I trust that make. I have bought this as a gift for my husband, thought it was time to introduce him to technology. I use one all the time & think he will really love it too. Until he actually gets it I can’t honestly comment on his use & No I will not give him his present till Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: FRAN

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad
customer_reviews.text: I have had my old iPad since 2014, which I use everyday, but is too old to support updates (which disappoints me that Apple do that) and is on its last legs. Decided to take the plunge and buy this one. Arrived next day and as per the advise of others, popped my iPhone next to it and the set was therefore so easy, this may well be different for others without existing Apple accounts etc. Lighter, slightly larger screen, crisp, clear and faster than my other one. Would comment that the battery is only so so, hence 4 stars. You may it better to change to chrome as the browser. Really pleased and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: orangejuice

customer_reviews.title: Siri saying not on line.
customer_reviews.text: Only 10 days old. Siri saying not on internet but I am. cannot get any further. Tech not getting back to me so having to send for repair . hope eventually to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: M. Aherne

customer_reviews.title: welcome to my new 7th generation ipad
customer_reviews.text: have had to say goodbye to my ipad 2, working very well as usual but unfortunately apps disappear as they are no longer available, so hello to my new 7th generation ipad. Simply wonderful, fast efficient, totally reliable. Did a chat line with Apple to transfer all my work from ipad2 and am thrilled with this new friend.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Barford

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I would 100% recommend for you to buy this the battery lasts over 10 hours even though it was a bit hard to get used to apple as i use android tablets it is still very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eda

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPad 10.2 .  32GB  WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present. Unfortunately the first one went missing during delivery but Amazon sent another out right away. I didn't receive it until after Christmas and although disappointed, after the receiver couldn't make his mind up if he wanted a new iPad or not, therefore I had started the return process then had to cancel the return process. Amazon were brilliant and VERY patient! The receiver of the iPad (almost to his head😏) is now VERY pleased and it seems to have been given the 👍. I got a fairly good deal when I bought it. The screen size is so much bigger and picture much clearer than his older iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from 2 x iPad 3s bought 8 (EIGHT) years ago!
customer_reviews.text: After 8 years, my daughters iPad3s were starting to creak; slow, running out or memory, and desired Apps were not compatible. Took the plunge (partially due to lock-down) and bought 2 10.2 iPads. I've not (yet) regretted the purchase for a moment. They're fast (very fast compared to iPad3), and happily the new machines were able to download the original profiles from the cloud. The charge retention, and recharging time is massively improved, as are the various security features. I'm glad I hung on as long as possible to the old machines (mine now!), but really pleased with what we've bought!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: GREAT IPAD 10.5inch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for mom's birthday. I really wanted it etched from Apple but it seemed it would take too long, so I checked out Amazon and it was on sale...I got her one from amazon and she received it super fast with Amazon Prime. Thank you Amazon for being such a great place to buy things for family who live in other countries.
customer_reviews.author: Haitham

customer_reviews.title: great price, brilliant iPad for most average people. who needs a pro?
customer_reviews.text: I always bought top of the range apple products (including the first gen iPad Pro) but now the top end prices are just too much for me. I bought this iPad as it's under £300 and it's a bargain at that price. it runs the latest ipad OS and has touch iD, apple pencil 1 support, great battery life (of course), and does the things a normal average user asks of it faultlessly. If you've never had an iPad before, or like me can't/won't pay the absurd prices for the Pro ranges, then this a great tablet for the price. Works seamlessly with my iPhone 11, MacBook 12", Apple TV and Homepods of course.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hanson

customer_reviews.title: What a relief
customer_reviews.text: I had a very old apple iPad which was past its time , not wanting to pay apple prices I brought a kindle fire .The fire in its self was ok for the price but no way like the apple. Kindle fire has major problem with recharging and after the second replacement and a good Christmas offer brought this iPad. Battery life is excellent ,apple apps brilliant, ease of use great ,well worth the extra money
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: I need a simple, straightforward manual,not an online difficult to use one broken into tiny sections.It is driving me "up the wall" at present.People say it is intuitive, but it's NOT if you belong to an older generation.A hard copy manual should come with the device.
customer_reviews.author: moondust

customer_reviews.title: Dire! Only able to recharge once
customer_reviews.text: Charged & did basic set up of the iPad, however when the battery needed to be recharged for the second time the lead plug wouldn't fit into the iPad Port. It was returned for repair but returned to me unrepaired as 'find your phone' wasn't disabled. Repair dept helpfully explained how to disable it & iPad was again returned for repair. I never saw it again. I sent messages & made phone calls & was told that it had been found, was repaired & being returned to me. It didn't arrive so eventually I was told that it was lost but couldn't, for reasons unknown to me, be replaced. Now awaiting refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. L. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Battery problem
customer_reviews.text: I opened my new iPad on Christmas Day and set it up for my daughter , everything seemed fine until Saturday the 28th of December when the battery does not seem to charge properly anymore . It takes about 2hours to charge 2-3 percent of the battery . I have tried my brand new iphone charger and still the same . I believe the battery is not charging . Can you get back to me so we can resolve this problem please . I hope to hear from you soon and thank you .
customer_reviews.author: mick dunne

customer_reviews.title: Especially love the split screen!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how these are so cheap at the side of the phones. And they seem cheaper than iPad minis which I can’t understand. I love this tablet, fantastic size and I love the split screen function. You can use an app and also make notes at the same time, either type or you can use an Apple Pencil with it or cheaper equivalent. It’s ideal for homework, office work or any task where you would need to use 2 apps at the same time on the same screen. It’s a lovely design and looks beautiful too. It runs perfect, no glitches.
customer_reviews.author: Sally smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for abandoned Lenovo.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a Lenovo 10" android tablet, which I loved, but unfortunately when it comes to system updates Lenovo abandon their customers, leaving me with a great tablet but unable to update apps. So after much thought I invested in this. It is a little strange going from android to iOS as the swiping etc is slightly different but I'm getting there😄 Battery life seems on par with my android, colours are vibrant and sound is great. I only use it for some games and browsing so it suits my needs and hopefully it will be more future-proof than the Lenovo.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: If you want to use MS office buy an older 10.1" ipad instead.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot put free MS Word etc on it because new 10.2" is considered a "pro" model by Microsoft and only office 365 with monthly subscription. Thanks Apple for not informing people! I would have bought an older model if I had known. I only bought the ipad to use with a keyboard as a wordprocessor for a college course. Now I have a useless toy tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Tiberius

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this IPad. Great quality sound and super easy to set up if you have an Apple iPhone. Just sync's all your information across!
customer_reviews.author: Poppy M

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth problem
customer_reviews.text: Thought it good value and as a Mac and iPhone user easy to use. The problem from the off was that Bluetooth did not work despite a 2 hour call to Apple Support. Sent it back to Amazon asking for a replacement who took nealy 2 weeks to return it saying there was not a problem, retuned the original and updated the software. There is still a slight problem with Bluetooth and I cannot be bothered to return it again. I would recommend never to buy such a device from Amazon a the after sales was poor.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than six week - NOT replaced
customer_reviews.text: The screen on this item went black and the item has to be returned for REPAIR, despite being within the return period and despite my having paid for additional insurance. It will be weeks before we get it back and, as it was bought especially for lockdown purposes this is NOT acceptable. VERY UNHAPPY with the SERVICE although the product itself, initially was good. Technical services admitted on the phone that there must be a software problem with it but still not an acceptable solution.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B. M. Postlethwaite

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy with This!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new tablet when my old 1st Gen Apple Ipad Air died after a good life! I knew I wanted a new Ipad, I did briefly try an android tablet and it just wasn't for me. It's slick, light, touch sensitive and does everything I need it too. It's not idea that if you want one you need to buy an Apple Pencil separately. I knew I wouldn't use one heaps so I bough and off brand pencil,which works really well. If you're an artist though you'll definitely want the real deal. The Ipad, a good bit of software, and the pencil is a great combination. Absolutely no problems with this at all. Delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: JustCharlieG

customer_reviews.title: Some dislikes
customer_reviews.text: Like this new iPad with the larger screen but find the emails are very difficult to read when displayed only down one side of the screen. My last iPad battery only lasted for.under five years which I think is bad! So I am not reviewing battery life on this new item.
customer_reviews.author: RDL

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating - no instructions
customer_reviews.text: I bought the iPad for portability. I have used iMac computers for decades and really like them. However, I wanted to ba able to access mail etc when I went to hospital. I'm afraid I have learnt to hate the iPad! It doesn't do what I want and does things which I don't want. I find it difficult to use fingers instead of curser. Perhaps my fingers are too thick? If i accidentally touch the screen, it does things I don't want and I don't know how to reverse it. There is no instruction manual and I am ready to discard it! Anyone want a very little used iPad?
customer_reviews.author: Irene Stirton

customer_reviews.title: Battery life not as good as the old ones!
customer_reviews.text: This was on a deal and was worth it, lovely iPad but their batteries are nowhere near as good as the one from my old 2010 iPad!! I used to get weeks out of the old iPad with exactly the same use (fb, shopping, browsing, couple of tv programs here and there), but this lasts a week or so. Still, that’s the same with most new electrical items I think. Check out my reviews for a great case to go with this iPad!!
customer_reviews.author: Alice C.

customer_reviews.title: Superb product
customer_reviews.text: Quality very good and functionality does everything required to protect my I pad , very pleased with this product s
customer_reviews.author: Anthony knox

customer_reviews.title: Love this iPad
customer_reviews.text: Love this iPad. I don’t know what generation my old iPad was but I do know it was old, slow and heavy etc However, this iPad is very sleek and light to hold. I love the speed of this new iPad. I’m so pleased I decided to invest in this iPad for many reasons. This iPad was very easy to setup etc. Packaging 2nd to none and was delivered before quoted date. I personally would recommend this iPad. I would buy from this vender again (this review was completed via my/this new iPad).
customer_reviews.author: Peter Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Brill
customer_reviews.text: It's an iPad they're just great, they just work and do it well. The new bigger form factor is a refreshing change. Nothing Android comes close at the moment unfortunately ...
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Major fault
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the product on 20 Nov 2019 it arrived on th 21 November. I have used it successfully since then. Yesterday I tried to charge it but the screen has stayed black and will not respond. I have tried the forced start procedure but to no avail. I need help. This is far too soon to have problems. I know at this time of isolations little can be done but I wish to record that I am not happy before any guarantee runs out. Allannah Daniel .
customer_reviews.author: Allannah Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The best iPad for value for money—always.
customer_reviews.text: What is there to dislike? I have nor found it yet. It performs every task that this piece of equipment was designed to do. If Apple are accepted as being the leading brand, and they should be, they brought us the design. Since then they have given us improvement after improvement. This applies to this model. There can’t in truth, be a lot more to say. Staying top of the pile can be very difficult, but Apple have managed to accomplish it in fine style.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't charge well when being used but plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes when I need to continue doing art or college work and my iPad is near dying, I need to plug it in. However, I've noticed whilst it's on charge and being used it doesn't gain battery, it still drains but slower then it would if off charge. I understand when using it this will cause some side effects to charging when it's on charge, but when needing to use it for college work in class all day, it's not 100% reliable. Would imagine it would atleast gain battery instead of losing it.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute rubbish
customer_reviews.text: There were multiple specks of dust on the inside after applying it to the ipad, these ended up with bubbles and after trying to remove specks the glass was no longer transparent and wouldn't stick. Returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: New iPad
customer_reviews.text: As advertised set up was fairly easy and so far I’m pleased with this iPad
customer_reviews.author: Vironment

customer_reviews.title: Touch Recognition Doesn't Work Within A Week Of First Use
customer_reviews.text: I started using my new I Pad a week ago, and I can't log in already. It asked me to think of an alphanumeric password when I first started using it. However, yesterday when I switched it on, it was only possible to use numbers, with numbers underneath small and unusable. Also, it wasn't doing fingerprint recognition at all, which was working the first day that I used it. I think it's a ploy by Apple to get you to buy other Apple products, so that it doesn't take you so long to log in or reset your password. I'm not buying the new Apple IPhone!!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Paine

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really do not like this iPad. My emails either do not come up at all, or they appear on Bin, I also used to be able to put a code for the Sun newspaper that doesn’t work either. I have resorted to using my old iPad which is very old but still works although very slow which was the reason for buying a new one. Have I just been unlucky or is there a fault with this iPad. Mrs Maureen Price
customer_reviews.author: M P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entertainment center
customer_reviews.text: I usually develop some Apple apps, so I bought this Pad. In other words, the original reason was to test my App. But now I am totally in love with it, it is my daily entertainment center, classical music, movies, games and so on. It's so cool. As a professional, I would say that its performance is absolutely enough to run games and high-definition movies. Under normal circumstances, you don't need to buy the air version, nor the pro, unless you want a lighter laptop. Personally, I prefer to use macbook pro because the system is more solid and stable. The iOS system is still best for iPhone and iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Blackguester

customer_reviews.title: A bit small and fiddly
customer_reviews.text: I found this iPad a little small and more difficult to use than my old one. The switches are fiddly and the plug s tiny. Siri is annoying and I am going to switch it off. The word proccesing is great. I we'd to use it more to really test it but so far it is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Poor on fingerprint recognition
customer_reviews.text: I find that the using the finger print to start very rarely works and nearly always have to wait until it stops rejecting your fingerprint and move onto the passcode and I have noticed that even pressing the button doesn't seam to help, good job you can still access the passcode eventually
customer_reviews.author: Mr David Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for my old 16gb model, which was faltering by lack of memory, and this is sooo much better and cheaper than the original. I like the updated menu access and that the previous three applications are easily accessed by a quick access area in the pinned menu bar. Wish I’d made the change a lot earlier. There is one downer though. I dislike the main keyboard as when I type quickly number replace letters. Have to research how to change this.
customer_reviews.author: MakenBill

customer_reviews.title: Apple every time.
customer_reviews.text: This my second iPad, I read that apple had a few issues with the new IOSpad 13.5.1 I don,t think this is performing as well as my previous model. I,m not a computer techs, so can only say it as I use it. I would not change it, as the pro,s are better than the minor negatives.
customer_reviews.author: roman enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Really good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: There are only 2 problems that I have found with this new iPad which are ; the keyboard flips to numbers when I am typing quickly involving the top row, and I did not realise when I bought it that it is WiFi only and only discovered when I looked for the slot to insert my SIM card. Otherwise I cannot fault it, oh yes and I don’t think the camera is as good as my old 4th gen.
customer_reviews.author: hc trom

customer_reviews.title: It's light, quick and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to use, responds quickly and is very efficient.
customer_reviews.author: jaybee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with item although Apple are the tops on tablets anyway. Easy to set up.Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet ... Although the battery does wear after a while
customer_reviews.text: The iPad is a great Tablet, and yes the addition of adding Apple Pencil and Smart Keyboard support to their other line ups of iPad makes this one worth buying for those who don't want to spend nearly £1,000 on an iPad Pro. But the fact that the battery life can be so so after a while like all Apple Products does make it a bit concerning but the tablet is really great and to be honest I think because off all the new features it makes the small inconvenience of maybe having to trave around with a battery backup and or the charger worth it.
customer_reviews.author: William McFadyen

customer_reviews.title: Quality device
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for an 11 year old to replace his ageing Samsung tablet and on perperation for secondary school. Not being a big apple fan there's no doubting the build quality and performance of this device although setting up parental controls took some time but that's more an issue with apples system than the device itself.
customer_reviews.author: darren jones

customer_reviews.title: No complaints from me or my wife!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first iPad that I’ve had and must say that I’m very impressed so far. It’s a large enough memory for my needs and the screen size is excellent, the sound and graphics are very acceptable. I can’t speak for the more technical minded people but I have no complaints. My wife has the same iPad and she’s equally pleased with hers. It’s a good first buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tiptonian

customer_reviews.title: Bigger  screen and very fast
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I like everything about this beautiful iPad, the looks, the size of the screen, battery life, very fast compared to my old iPad air2 It’s worth the money easily. I would recommend it any day. For the price you can’t go wrong, it’s worth every penny. I love it, I think it’s really good value for money. And Amazon delivered It so fast, very good service.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Theo

customer_reviews.title: forced to upgrade...
customer_reviews.text: ...but what a price! Getting this for £290 on here was a steal! And made me feel better about having to upgrade with apple discontinuing supporting for my previous one. Would recommend this over the iPad Air ... can't see benefit in spending extra money for slightly better specs. Especially if you just use it for web/YouTube/email etc...
customer_reviews.author: jimmycotts

customer_reviews.title: iPad 10.2 - Top Quality!
customer_reviews.text: As always, Apple are a little pricey but I’m overall please with this iPad 10.2 - worth the money I’d say Decent sized screen & easy to use. Nice slim line design Top quality! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING IPAD
customer_reviews.text: This was for my daughter because this coronavirus is very hard and it was a good thing in the dark and she has loved it she is 12 and has used it 24/7!She loves it the voice quality is amazing and the picture all of her apps that are on her phone downloaded good onto her new iPad👍🏻Her battery is amazing always on it and it hasn’t died on her yet it has been 1week! Overall AMAZING but costy but worth it I think (we took it out of her bank she made me)
customer_reviews.author: Sally A Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Slick, budget-friendly iPad.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great bit of tech. Not gonna lie, Apple fanboy here. Purchased the new 2019 iPad to replace my ailing 1st gen iPad and I’m glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Count Ian Devlin

customer_reviews.title: VERY DIFFICULT TO SET UP  HAVE TO PAY COMPUTER MAN TO SET IT UP
customer_reviews.text: VERY DIFFICULT TO SET UP HAVING TO PAY COMPUTER MAN TO SET IT UP WISH I NEVER BROUGHT IT CANT GET INTERNET ON IT ETC NO GOOD TO ME LIKE THIS A LOT OF MONEY TO SEND OUT NOW FINDING IT WILL NOT WORK ..... STILL NOT WORKING AND ALL THAT MONEY I AM AN OLD OAP
customer_reviews.author: maureen r.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for sixth form and at home
customer_reviews.text: I bough this for my daughter for sixth form, as her laptop was to big for her to take to school. I also purchased her the 1st generation apple pencil as she's taken fine art, having purchased the procreate app her digital art is amazing on this. We also bought a non apple keyboard which came with a case and an insert for her apple pencil, absolutely brilliant for her to use in her English literature lessons. We're both really delighted with just how useful this will be at school and home.
customer_reviews.author: patsy

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage!
customer_reviews.text: This item doesn’t work! Unfortunately we were out of the country from a week after we bought it! Just back and was going to return only to discover we’re out of time! What a nonsense!
customer_reviews.author: M Coles

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on iPad 7
customer_reviews.text: Better than traveling to an apple store, and I hate the aftercare for the likes of Currys. At the time it was the cheapest I could find, and offset the cost of the apple care that I always get.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Broke after falling from a sofa despite having a protective case
customer_reviews.text: This model is very fragile and can break very easily. We had it for one month and use it with a shockproof case but it got broke after it fell from a sofa. The 1 year included warranty didn't cover this incident. There should be a clear warning for this product has a very poor drop-test standard.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic iPad and service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this iPad as a Christmas present in a Lightning sale. It arrived very well packaged and protected which was nice to see. The iPad works faultlessly and as always is fantastic apple quality. I’ve never purchased an Apple product directly from amazon before but I’ll have no hesitation to do so again 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Smooth45

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant like all Apple products.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an iPad - that’s all there is to say really 10/10 for all Apple products always. Bought two - one for a die hard android fan who’s now a convert, another fit a lady in her 80s - both using them effectively within minutes. Very very happy Amazon are now selling Apple products - makes thing so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: My Great Dane. trod on my last iPad and shattered it. Getting it repaired seemed uneconomical and so I bought this iPad on monthly terms with Amazon. This enabled me to buy a top of the range iPad. I’m very pleased all round. The charge does take many hours but okay if done overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Hunnypot

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I had an ipad mini before this one. That was really good, but very old. This one has a bigger screen and an excellent performance. Only problem is I am enjoying rather a lot, if its a choice between housework and gardening and sitting in a comfortable chair with the ipad - guess which one wins!
customer_reviews.author: Christine in France

customer_reviews.title: Useless when  used with products other than Apple.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok as long as everything you want to link it with is made by Apple. Apple make everything as difficult and confusing as possible to link it with Google and Microsoft products. Too much junk and rubbish on it that you'll never use, most of which is to make more money for Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Typical Apple product does what says on the box brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top Class.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit more expensive than some but at least you know the graphic card and other aspects are up to the mark. Immaculately presented I’m very pleased with the product. Don’t waste your money on more expensive releases. It does as much as my iPad 11 pro.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Replaced iPad air and this thing is a beast in power
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old iPad Air. Got an Apple Pencil as a gift for Christmas, little did the giftee know that my iPad Air wasn't compatible, so ended up having to buy this to actually use it. MUCH faster, MUCH better battery life and 100% compatible with Apple pencil. Happy and hope it lasts as long as my last one did.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bennett

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not normally an Apple person, but I decided to go with an iPad instead of an android tablet for Procreate (drawing app). I use my iPad for Netflix, drawing, and occasional social media. The battery lasts for ages, even with heavy use (I charge it every few days). It's the perfect size and I'm glad I didn't go with the pro model. It's a fantastic tablet and is worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Laura Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy transfer of files from old device to new.
customer_reviews.text: It's almost ridiculous writing a review for an iPad as they are really dependable. It works exactly as it should and was bought as a replacement for a very old iPad. All the files and apps transferred seamlessly and the device was up and running within an hour of it arriving.
customer_reviews.author: fenella whittle

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade to mini
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my partner as an upgrade and replacement for her vintage ipad mini. Her feedback after a month is that it is much faster with a larger screen than her Ipad mini. She is happy with the product and it has been an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, decent value
customer_reviews.text: The iPad is still by far the best tablet, and with the pressure from big phones, it has never been better value for money. You can, of course, but far cheaper tablets, but they ain’t as good. If you have children using your one, buy a strong case!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Ratter

customer_reviews.title: It won’t always charge
customer_reviews.text: My iPad does not alway like charging. I cannot download my stuff from college. I am very disappointed with this iPad it’s so tempo mental. I will be looking to change it
customer_reviews.author: Poppet

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover.
customer_reviews.text: My young people cannot keep there hands off as there is a wonderful picture of an Elephant bowing bubbles on the front.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. A. W. Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad.
customer_reviews.text: After having an iPad 2nd generation this is so good. More memory, easy to use and was able to transfer my apps and photos without any problem. I did get this a little cheaper as it had been used, but it is the latest one and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old iPad 5, many new features, a lot faster speed wise. Love it and a good price compared to Apple site.
customer_reviews.author: D Ross

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: From the day I bought it I have been in curing problems, I only wanted it for one website which I downloaded, and twice the screen went black and I had to download the website again, please don't buy anything recycled. I'm sure mine is. Sandra
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: 32gb device is suitable for an elderly use who just wants email and FB.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mum who needed an easy to use device for FB and checking her security cameras. She also needed accessible functions, which the iPad has. This 32gb memory might be too tight for the more ambitious user.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Performer
customer_reviews.text: Apple is always the best in terms of performance and usability. Bought this for my 5 year old and she likes it to the core. It pinches the pocket a bit but it is worth it if you forget the price you paid for it. When my daughter is not using, my wife & me will watch videos on this and it works like a cake. No performance lags, with integration with Google apps now available for iDevices it is a great device.
customer_reviews.author: Srikanth Reddy J

customer_reviews.title: What's not to iLike?
customer_reviews.text: Fab. I have never been a fan but since needing more connectivity options, chat or conferencing tools I decided it was time. I went for lower spec on memory and WiFi only, after all I can use my phones data if I need it. And not disappointed. It is now my #2 gadget after my Nespresso!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade for me after my iPad mini stopped updating. Better size too. My only minus is with Safari, larger screen but no larger text!! 🤓 tried all settings to increase the font but nothing worked! so installed G Chrome which has bigger font
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: APPLE IPAD 128GB
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother in law but I set it all up for him and it’s working absolutely fine! Took a bit longer to get here but with everything going on can’t expect anything more! So all round very happy with this iPad and my brother in law loves it
customer_reviews.author: DELBOY

customer_reviews.title: A dream to have
customer_reviews.text: Replacing my 7 year old iPad was the best thing I’ve done. It’s lightweight to use for reading... It’s fast, efficient and I’m sure I still have a lot to learn about it’s full potential, but so far I’m very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: CarolineG

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love iPad and this doesn’t disappoint . Super fast . If you can afford one get it you won’t be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Rayobeez

customer_reviews.title: Easy To use, Snappy And Just overall great.
customer_reviews.text: This IPad is great, It completes all tasks with ease and has all the apps anybody would need, iOS Is very intuitive, and easy to pick up, the screen looks great with a nice resolution and vibrant colours and plays all games with ease and can make a nice little machine to play games on In your free time. Over all this is a great tablet, especially If you could get it in a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this iPad which is on a different level to my old version 2 one. It’s so quick and the display is crystal clear. These tablets aren’t the cheapest but there’s a reason for that; they’re simply the best
customer_reviews.author: Bauhouse68

customer_reviews.title: Latest Apple ipad
customer_reviews.text: Great product as you’d expect from Apple, the screens bigger and the pad is slimmer which is great, has some improved features and feels lighter than previous models, arrived on time in sealed box, would recommend
customer_reviews.author: PJ55

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Apple product.
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest price was on Amazon so this is where I purchased it. Gotten for the Daughter at Christmas and she loves it. Typical Apple fantastic quality so I do not need to get into this. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: P. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My first iPad after years of Android tablets. Wish I'd got one years ago. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Allan W.

customer_reviews.title: Love my ipad
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with my iPad. It is gorgeous looking, easier to use than my laptop. Very fast - my old laptop doesn’t hold a candle to it. I did buy the 128gb - it was a bit more expensive but worth it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Drin

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how easy it was to setup. Also very pleased with the battery life, can't believe how long it will be in use before it starts to drop below 100 percent level. Would totally recommend the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: As good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it, typical Ipad does what it say on the box, the only downside is I expected it to be able to take a SIM card but that’s entirely my fault for not reading the ad properly. Not a big issue it just means no internet without WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: victoria mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Still as good as ever
customer_reviews.text: I pad is not the cheapest tablet but in my opinion they are still the best would be better if you could expand the memory Though the more memory the iPad the more expensive it becomes but if you want the best you have to pay for it
customer_reviews.author: tony hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: For photography use
customer_reviews.text: Came nicely boxed, genuine article. Unfortunately apart from charging up not used as yet as need a piece of equipment to download photos from camera onto the device which I hadn't realised. Handy size and looking forward to seeing quality of images in due course.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I have just upgraded from an ipad 2, pleased i did this is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: BuyItNow

customer_reviews.title: The reference
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Bought it for my wife and she seems happy with it. Great product ! Go for the cellular version it's better value !
customer_reviews.author: Rémi

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself
customer_reviews.text: Already Owning an iPhone this was an absolute breeze to set up just login with your iCloud details and you are away !! Video quality and sound are fantastic watching my daily fix of itv/bbc iplayer etc
customer_reviews.author: mais vais-je suivre

customer_reviews.title: It's basically a small computer
customer_reviews.text: Can't fault ipad, bought for my child as game apps don't work on standard tablets, she loves it, bought for reasonable price black Friday deal... Expect it to last some years as it cost same as a computer and that's what it is similar too.
customer_reviews.author: bigeyes
